name: Mythical Dash
description:
A two-player endless game which revolves around two mythological characters. The goal is to survive the other player. There will be many obstacles out to get you and paths to choose from. Important information underneath!!

P.S.
Unfortunately, this games was created to be played with a custom controller, so there aren't instructions on how to play with keyboard. Because of this, I will leave the keybinds in below. Hope you enjoy the game! 

Game keybinds:
start / reset game - 'h'

Egyptian character:
jump - 'p'
slide - 'o'
special ability - 'i'

Greek character: 
jump - 'w'
slide - 'q'
special ability - 'e'
